It's here!

The new academic wing of Mariemont High School is open for business! Because of COVID-19 restrictions, we were only able to hold a small ribbon cutting ceremony on Sunday with the Board of Education, administrative team, construction team and their families. We will host a community event when it is safe to do so.

But we still want everyone to join in on the celebration and see the new high school and all of the ways it will transform education for our current and future students. Enjoy this firsthand look at the new Mariemont High School!
